statements: SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT location, energy_consumed, date FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE device_id = 123;
SELECT device_id, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE location = 'Living Room';
SELECT date, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT AVG(energy_consumed) AS avg_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE location = 'Kitchen';
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT AVG(energy_consumed) AS avg_energy_consumed, MAX(energy_consumed) AS max_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE device_id = 1
SELECT location, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY location ORDER BY total_energy_consumed DESC
SELECT date, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_consumed > 100 ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT device_id, AVG(energy_consumed) AS avg_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY device_id HAVING AVG(energy_consumed) > 50
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT house_id, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_consumed > 100;
SELECT * FROM resource_allocation ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT zone_id, AVG(resource_allocated) AS average_allocation FROM resource_allocation GROUP BY zone_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE house_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC, energy_consumed ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT house_id, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY house_id HAVING total_energy_consumed > 100 ORDER BY total_energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT house_id, COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' GROUP BY house_id ORDER BY num_records DESC;
SELECT house_id, AVG(energy_consumed) AS avg_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_consumed > 50 GROUP BY house_id ORDER BY avg_energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT house_id, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE house_id IN (SELECT house_id FROM resource_allocation WHERE resource_allocated > 500) ORDER BY house_id ASC, energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT energy_value, location FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_value > 100;
SELECT location, energy_value FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM smart_meters WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT installation_date, customer_id FROM smart_meters ORDER BY installation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE location='New York' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT SUM(energy_value) AS total_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT location, AVG(energy_value) AS avg_energy_consumption FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY location HAVING AVG(energy_value) > 100;
SELECT * FROM smart_meters WHERE installation_date < '2022-01-01' AND customer_id = 12345;
SELECT resource_type, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity_allocated FROM resource_allocation GROUP BY resource_type ORDER BY total_quantity_allocated DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location, timestamp FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE energy_consumption > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE username = 'JohnDoe';
SELECT reading_id, reading_value FROM MeterReading ORDER BY reading_value ASC;
SELECT * FROM ResourceAllocation WHERE allocated_amount < 500 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT location, energy_consumption FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE energy_consumption > 100 ORDER BY energy_consumption DESC
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE address LIKE '%Street%'
SELECT reading_value, timestamp FROM MeterReading WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM ResourceAllocation WHERE allocated_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT id, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location_id, SUM(energy_usage) AS total_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY location_id;
SELECT * FROM grid_locations WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100;
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_data WHERE name = 'John Smith';
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT location_id, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_usage > 100;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM user_data WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM meter_devices WHERE installation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM grid_locations ORDER BY latitude DESC, longitude ASC;
